author: vickaboleyn
body:
Lo primero que Magni Ragnarsson pensó al contemplar a la joven de largos cabellos oscuros y ojos carmesí fue que una hija de Odín había bajado a Midgard a vivir entre los hombres. Se habían encontrado en el mismo pasillo a eso de la medianoche. Él pasaba por ese camino fingiendo patrullar la zona, buscando con los ojos a la hermana de un amigo suyo; ella bebía la sangre de uno de los eunucos del palacio, a quien había drogado para que no sintiera el dolor de su mordida.

La cruzada de miradas fue instantánea. Fue amor a primera vista, o al menos eso quería pensar en ese momento.

Pasó junto a ella con toda la tranquilidad posible, esperando a que ella comprendiera el mensaje: él sabía *qué* era mas no se metería en su asunto. Estuvo a punto de doblar en la esquina cuando la dulce voz de la mujer le detuvo.

Acercándose a él, la joven le dijo: "Tú no eres humano".

Magni le miró de reojo; la joven contempló sus dorados ojos con curiosidad natural, a lo que añadió: "¿Cuál es tu nombre?"

El vamphum se volvió hacia ella y le respondió: "Soy solo un sirviente más de este palacio. Mi nombre no es de importancia".

La joven, con suspicacia, replicó: "Ningún guardia pasa cerca del harén a estas altas horas de la noche".

"Bueno, supongo que ningún guardia se ha fijado en usted devorando la sangre de un pobre eunuco".

La mujer se rio. Magni, con una sonrisa, añadió: "Yo tampoco he visto nada esta noche, excepto un jardín repleto de lindas mujeres que fueron secuestradas para satisfacer a un solo gobernante necesitado de herederos, sin importarle si eran viudas, casadas o solteras antes. Ahora, si me disculpa, iré a echar un vistazo al jardín".

Magni reanudó su marcha con la intención de perpetrar en el harén; mientras más pronto localice a la hermana de su amigo y la sacase de ahí, más pronto se marcharía del Palacio Topkapi y de Estambul. Le daba mala espina quedarse un tiempo más en aquél lugar repleto de intrigas por el poder. Pero la chica no parecía dejarle ir; en su lugar, empezó a preguntarle a quién buscaba y si era orden directa de la Valide Sultán o del propio sultán. Magni, volviéndose hacia ella, le respondió que solo estaba haciendo una ronda nocturna ante los rumores de un intento de asesinato a una de las favoritas.

Creyó que de ese modo ella lo dejaría en paz.

Se equivocó: Ella no se tragó el cuento. "Si es un rumor, ya se sabría", le dijo. "El harén es un lugar donde no se pueden esconder secretos".

Poniéndose delante, añadió: "¿A quién buscas?"

"A la hermana de un amigo que está justo ahí dentro... Supongo".

"¿Es tu novia?"

"No, pero es una gran amiga a quien aprecio mucho. La secuestraron en Grecia mientras compraba en el mercado local. Mi amigo, mi hermano y yo estuvimos rastreando a los turcos durante meses".

"Bueno, en este caso puedo ayudarte. Solo descríbemela y la encontraré".

"¿A cambio de qué? Digo, he de suponer que quieres algo en correspondencia"

"No se te escapa nada".

"Viniendo de una vampiresa, no".

La aludida sonrió. "Ya que lo pones así, hagamos este trato: Yo te ayudo a encontrar a tu amiga, y tú me sacas del palacio. Así estaríamos a mano".

Extendiendo la mano, añadió: "Me llamo Carmilla, pero todos en el palacio me llaman Mihrimah".

Magni, contemplando los ojos de la bella Mihrimah, le dio un apretón de manos al mismo tiempo que le decía: "Magni Ragnarsson".

https://images.pexels.com/photos/5084076/pexels-photo-5084076.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&dpr=1&w=500 **Fuente de la imagen: [Pexels](https://www.pexels.com/photo/domed-mausoleum-mosque-with-high-towers-5084076/)** https://images.hive.blog/0x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/vickaboleyn/ddfl4myt-vickaboleyn.gif
title: Relato: Mihrimah y Magni

author: leandrolucero
body:
What is Airdrop?
system for cryptocurrency startups to promote or publicize their new token by dropping little amounts of free crypto to individuals who register through Telegram, Google form, or directly to their particular website. Qualified individuals may get additional crypto by referring to others using social media, community campaigns, and the like.
![airdrop.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/7jz3Yiu.jpg)

Where to find Airdrops?
Here are top 5 websites for Airdrops according to coincodex.com; 
1. Airdropalert.com 
2. Airdrops.io 
3. Airdropsmob.com
4. Bountiesalert.com
5. Airdropbob.com

Airdrop Scams
Usually, the scammers trick the users into providing their information such as their social media info, email address and wallet address. The information is then either sold to a third party or used for phishing. And trust me, you don't want that.

![airdropscam.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/9hwBKgp.jpg)

Scammers are proliferating on the web most especially in telegram. The best way to avoid airdrop scams is to register to legit airdrop websites such as the ones mentioned above. 


The risks of participating Airdrops (DOs and DON'Ts)
1. Airdrops that require KYC (Know your client/customer) can utilize your identity such as your nationality, ID, email address, etc. that can be very useful for identity thieves;
2. If you are required to deposit an amount of crypto for so-called verification, RUN;
3. Create a wallet solely for airdrops to avoid losing hackers from stealing your coins/token;
4. Never share your private keys. Your private keys are the doorway to your treasure chest, keep it secured.


I hope this little piece of information about Airdrops helps minimize if not eradicate the risks of losing your coins or tokens.

Posted Using [LeoFinance <sup>Beta</sup>](https://leofinance.io/@leandrolucero/the-dangers-of-airdrops-and-how-to-avoid-airdrop-scams)
title: The dangers of Airdrops and how to avoid airdrop SCAMS

author: camanda
body:
Bitcoin in early 2021 was in good form by continuing to break ATH's latest record but Bitcoin's movements are now starting to plunge. Bitcoin price touched $40,000 per BTC last week on *[Coinmarketcap](Coinmarketcap.com)* , but after that it was in correction trend and briefly plunged into $34,000 per BTC. Nevertheless, the price of Bitcoin has now started to rise again on Saturday Jan, 16th the price of Bitcoin was already at the level of $37,432 per BTC.

https://www.newsbtc.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/shutterstock_1121540051.jpg

Bitcoin's volatile price movements are still in reasonable condition, the increase in parabolic that occurred since the middle of last year would be better if it could be maintained risks. We can looking from 2017 ago, when there was a parabolic increase and accompanied by correction of 20-30% is actually quite reasonable, beyond the correction, bitcoin's recent positive trend is inseparable from the liquidity currently flooding the market.

https://cms.qz.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/JPMorgan-thinks-crypto-has-potential.jpg?quality=75&strip=all&w=1400

Bitcoin's sharply rising price is inseparable from massive purchases made by giant institutional investors such as Microstrategy and PayPal. JP Morgan also upgradin bitcoin outlook which will encourage many of the institutions involved to make bitcoin its transaction tool. Bitcoin's positive trend is a breath of fresh air for other cryptocurrencies as it will be splashed out, although its rise is likely to be too late to follow BTC. This is because the institution trusts only a few major crypto assets as investment objectives like Bitcoin and Ethereum. In the current condition, if investors can tolerate the risk of an increase followed by correction of 20-30%, then dollar cost averaging strategy can be an option. However, if you have good skills in performing technical analysis, it can be done to assess whether Bitcoin has enough correction and buy at the right moment.

![image.png](https://i.imgur.com/0wGBSLu.png)

In my personal opinion as Crypto Enthusiast price Bitcoin has a chance to reach $50,000 per BTC in the near future because at the beginning of the year Bitcoin has high volatility, so the possibility of overshot uptrend can occur in Q1 or Q2 of 2021 soon. e High record seeing as bitcoin's performance continues to increase steadily. I think investing Bitcoin is not too late and can be profitable, but once again this is just my personal opinion as a crypto enthusiast, I'm not an expert trader or professional financial advisor.
> ***Do With Your Own Research and Do With Your Own Risk.***

Well, let's see whats next on Bitcoin Stage, will it increase as predicted or vice versa? What do you think of this? i also want to know about your opinion is it true this is just a correction or will there be a bitcoin bubble? 

Image Resource :
[Bitcoin](https://www.newsbtc.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/shutterstock_1121540051.jpg), [JP Morgan](https://cms.qz.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/JPMorgan-thinks-crypto-has-potential.jpg?quality=75&strip=all&w=1400) and [Trading View Chart](tradingview.com)

> ***The Wise Man said Sharing is Caring
If you liked this article, don't forget to upvote and rehive. Thank you and let's become friends to share knowledge each others :)***

author: themarkymark
body:
![image.png](https://images.hive.blog/DQmeULzrcvDJEPJp8xWwqUbQXPXc2ZiawsnrwE6VQ9r4mqB/image.png)

The Pakistan economy has been suffering for the last few years, not unlike many countries these days.  One of the four Pakistan providences is investing in Bitcoin mining to change this.

The Khyber Pakhtunkhwa providence bought two Bitcoin mining farms a week ago.  

<center>https://i.imgur.com/zRnVv6n.png</center>

Pakistan recently adopted Crypto friendly laws prior to this announcement.  While many countries have started to turn to crypto, no other country has used government funds to  participate in mining crypto currencies.  Iran said they would invest in Bitcoin mining last year but so far has not done so.

How do you feel if governments started to use taxes to pay for mining equipment to start compete with other miners.  While it is extremely bullish, it brings with it some interesting concerns.

Pakistan has been known to have frequent power problems and recently had the [largest power failure](https://www.nytimes.com/2021/01/09/world/asia/pakistan-blackout-power-failure.html) around the same time the government started mining although not related.

Most of Bitcoin mining is done in China where they have extremely low power costs due to a surplus of mega dams built in the 1950's.

![image.png](https://images.hive.blog/DQmQGYQ22JYGU212EBVPr7sLbp3EUoamNtZGJyRMpwYbCFB/image.png)<sub>[Source](https://www.aljazeera.com/economy/2020/7/6/chinas-mega-dams-are-giving-way-to-cheaper-renewable-energy)</sub>

author: cryptowendyo
body:
![8D642154D0684857A766F738A3D896EF.jpeg](https://i.imgur.com/DAlclF0.jpg)

# Hello Leofinance!

### This is @cryptowendyo and I recently decided to join the Leofinance Community, thanks to @shortsegments.

## Who am I?

I am a wife, a mother, a Cryptocurrency YouTuber, a Cryptocurrency Tweeter on Twitterer, and a Cryptocurrency Trader.

I am currently focused on my own business called **Beyond Associates**, which provides transparent marketing, business development, brand building, media solutions, and professional events for blockchain companies globally.

#### PROFESSIONAL BACKGROUND

Prior to my involvement with cryptocurrency, I worked in healthcare at the largest infectious disease company in the world. My role consisted of working with newly diagnosed and existing patients to coordinate their care. This involved coordinating the care of over three hundred patients per monthly between all healthcare providers. I also played an important role in implementing a new CRM database and I was the Lead Trainer for the new system conversion nationwide.  Towards the end of my career in healthcare, I was in charge of  integrating social media into my companies marketing efforts for my department as a source of new clients.


#### Blockchain

My Journey into cryptocurrency

I became interested in cryptocurrency & blockchain technology in late 2017. I was in a transitional time of my life, I had a one-year-old and was in the process of quitting my job in healthcare that I had for seven years—I was searching and praying for a change.

#### Bitcoin

I remember calling my husband and telling him I was going to take some money from savings and invest in Bitcoin. After buying this *magic internet money*, I began researching and soon found that blockchain technology would not only revolutionize & improve the quality of life but that it would also provide financial reformation for people globally. 

#### REKT

The next week my investment tanked 28%, which had me more intrigued. The volatility was exciting, and I began to invest more and start to trade. Keep in mind, I had no idea what I was doing. I would buy alts and profit. However, I didn’t realize we were in the bull run, and my luck would soon run out. Bitcoin hit 20K, and I held on to all my investment positions and soon was left REKT. 

From there, I figured I would teach myself how to trade and understand why I didn’t see the big drop coming. I did, I bought two used technical analysis books on eBay and practiced daily.

#### YouTube, Instagram and Twitter

So I taught myself to trade using technical analysis. Once I felt confident enough, I began posting my content on Twitter and IG, and people liked it. My account and online presence grew, from there I started hosting free crypto meetups in Los Angles, and they grew as well. 

From here, I started a YouTube channel to live stream my meetups and crypto companies began to take notice. I began being asked to do promotional interviews and project reviews. With the income from trading and marketing, I was able to travel across the country to conferences and able to work from home while in school and taking care of my daughter.

#### My Life Now

Currently, I trade part time due to my schedule and work doing marketing, consulting and media for various crypto projects in the space and focus on transparency. I’ve done media and promotion (front and back end) with over 30 companies in crypto. Currently, I’m focused on hosting my Daily Crypto with Wendy O show on YouTube (which airs three-fourX week), marketing advisor for The Tour De Crypto Charity, Advisor for Rapids, Marketing and Community Growth for Monetary Unit, and hosting meetups and traveling.



#### My YouTube Channel
![F88A49F1D3C84199960D92D47CC683AA.jpeg](https://i.imgur.com/XN9xxDZ.jpg)

I provides educational videos of blockchain and cryptocurrency via YouTube and Twitter, where I have a growing audience of 22,000 and over 341,289 views. I have interviewed public figures in the space such as Justin Sun and Timothy C. Draper. 

###### If you join my Channel from here, please leave a Comment that your from Leofinance!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nLCBIdiorns


# Last words...

I am particularly in tune to Cryptocurrency, so Leofinance may be a perfect place for me to establish a presence and network with cryptocurrency enthusiasts from around the world. Thanks @shortsegments

## @cryptowendyo
.
.
![1B2B75BCD2214A70BAD20C539769C7C2.jpeg](https://i.imgur.com/5Ohfpsv.jpg)
.

author: iaberius
body:
<center>
![imagen.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/iaberius/2VKsdOiK-imagen.png)
</center>

Decidió volver sobre sus pasos y seguir la ribera por fuera del cañizar. Anduvo así durante un buen rato, abriéndose camino colina arriba, cada cincuenta o sesenta pasos, para otear. Finalmente descubrió un sendero que cortaba el matorral y serpenteaba hacia la orilla. Lo siguió hasta llegar a un espacio abierto sin apenas vegetación. Debía de ser un bebedero al que acudían las bestias. Jabalíes, por las huellas que apreciaba. Lo cierto es que el agua tenía mucho mejor aspecto por allí.

Se acercó y desenganchó el odre. Luego se soltó el fardo de la espalda y lo echó a un lado. La loriga sonó contra el suelo. Se acercó con cuidado al borde y se agachó para beber. Se encontró con su reflejo. El agua le devolvía la imagen de un hombre enjuto de rostro sucio y patético.

-¡Mierda de algarada!

Fatigas y penalidades: eso era lo único que se traía de vuelta a Escalona. Todo por seguir al maldito don Sancho. Juró con rabia y escupió al suelo. Luego una sonrisa torva le iluminó el rostro. Le consolaba pensar que la cabeza del caballero se estaría ahora pudriendo, colgada de las murallas de Andújar.

Se lavó las manos. El agua estaba fría pero no era una sensación desagradable. Notaba la corriente, muy tenue. Hizo cuenco con las manos y empezó a beber.

Menudo desastre. Habían salido de Escalona a finales de agosto. Medio centenar de lanzas; jinetes pardos como él, de la milicia del concejo, y algún caballero. Pretendían una incursión rápida. Lo suficiente para rapiñar algo de botín y estar en casa antes del otoño.

Cruzaron Sierra Morena por Eznavejor, el paso oriental. Quedaba más lejos que el del Muradal pero sabían, por los abulenses, que estaba bastante desguarnecido. Para mediados de septiembre, estaban saqueando a placer las huertas del valle alto del Guadalquivir.

Iban tan confiados que no los vieron llegar. Los almohades los alcanzaron cerca de Andújar. Y les pasaron por encima. Una tropa de guerreros masmuda de túnica blanca, tez oscura y coraje fanático. Unos hideputas bien armados. Nada que ver con los andalusíes, refinados y cobardes. En aquella llanura, la caballería de Escalona fue aniquilada por completo.

Un pato pequeño de cabeza bermeja sacó a Nuño de sus pensamientos. Emergió repentinamente del agua, no muy lejos de donde estaba, y volvió a zambullirse después de aletear ruidosamente.

El pardo había calmado la sed y ahora prestaba atención a las manchas marrones que le cubrían los brazos. La sangre del viejo se había secado y formaba, ahora, grandes costras pegadas a la piel. También a la barba. El maldito se le había agarrado cuando le cortó el cuello y lo había puesto perdido. Soltó un gruñido sordo y empezó a frotarse los brazos dentro del agua.

Continúa >

Autor: Javier G. Alcaraván (@iaberius)

<sub>La imagen que encabeza el texto es una acuarela del pintor daimieleño Juan Gallego (@arcoiris). El archivo digital me lo ha cedido el propio artista para ilustrar este fragmento.</sub>
title: El pardo (2)

author: xandra79
body:
![image.png](https://images.hive.blog/DQmXvAeFd6nGMxic1c77JABnwoea698ieDGvMQqPGX2UmpE/image.png)

Saludos mis queridos hivers.

En esta oportunidad de cumpleaños mi papá, 68 años de edad. Una ocasión para sentirse agradecido con Dios y la vida...

Y como la vida hay que sentirla y vibrarla en armonía, nos fuimos a pasar un rato diferente, a almorzar en un restaurant donde hacen una parrilla exquisita y es económica en comparación con otros sitios. Se trata del Restaurant Suelo Larense y queda en la calle 60 de Barquisimeto, Estado Lara.
![image.png](https://images.hive.blog/DQmW6BATnjKKQuWWPjwoAAK4tx1xbrt4jDepY81MZfLBDB7/image.png)

Greetings my dear hivers.

On this birthday opportunity my dad, 68 years old. An occasion to feel grateful to God and life ... And since life has to be felt and vibrated in harmony, we went to have a different time, to have lunch in a restaurant where it makes an exquisite grill and it is cheap compared to other places. This is Suelo Larense Restaurant and is located on 60 street in Barquisimeto, Lara State.

![IMG_20210104_134744.jpg](https://images.hive.blog/DQmazmTcnPDeFtbk22Uo1bgWAD3zNP3XjCe5bR6UXCMdrP1/IMG_20210104_134744.jpg)

La parrilla estuvo excelente, traía carne, pollo, chorizo, yuca, tostones, lonjas de queso y lechuga, tomate y cebolla. Y no podía faltar la guasacaca.
![IMG_20210104_135542.jpg](https://images.hive.blog/DQmeERE3VNpidEzvrc4u6yj9dGw4jGGJCkdh819jCJxv2iB/IMG_20210104_135542.jpg)

The grill was excellent, it had meat, chicken, chorizo, yucca, plantains, slices of cheese and lettuce, tomato and onion. And the guasacaca could not be absent.

![image.png](https://images.hive.blog/DQmfGvY4Jqxe5HxFhES6sgDQZxv2X49xKqGigpo6B8WbLL9/image.png) [Fuente](https://images.app.goo.gl/Pq2J9hbG2zSZogZ48)
Al final del almuerzo cantamos cumpleaños. Solo nos bastó una ración de torta que vendían en el establecimiento para cantar cumpleaños con alegria y regalar nuestros mejores deseos de salud, paz, amor y prosperidad. Afortunadamente nos hicieron el favor en el Restaurant de colocar la canción y pudimos cantarla a todo pulmón (Risas).
At the end of lunch we sing birthdays. Only a portion of cake sold in the establishment was enough for us to sing birthdays with joy and give our best wishes for health, peace, love and prosperity. Fortunately, they did us a favor in the Restaurant by placing the song and we were able to sing it at the top of our lungs (laughs).
![IMG_20201212_145353.jpg](https://images.hive.blog/DQmWhEpgkqxQqqwaEdwKGPCjyVpu1vidtpBg5DcK3BWsoFf/IMG_20201212_145353.jpg)
Al otro día seguimos la octavita e hicimos un hervido, de esos que le encantan a papá. Si no fuera por estos momentos, que sería la vida.
The next day we followed the celebration and made a soup, the kind that dad loves. If it weren't for these moments, what would life be like?

![image.png](https://images.hive.blog/DQmULXSxjtx5FvyVHfNyS7G8fv6Mqi2rJYq7YL6jfn9ULPb/image.png)

68 años se dice muy fácil, pero cuántas alegrías y tristezas, cuántas luchas y caídas, cuántas perdidas de familiares, pero sobre todo cuántas sonrisas y hermosos amaneceres.

Noté a mi papá nostalgico, debe ser porque ya mi mamá partió de este mundo y se que la extraña aún mucho. Me pongo en sus zapatos porque todos vamos para allá y comparto su sentimiento, el perder tu compañero de vida; pero lo más importante es levantarse y seguir, porque somos valientes y debemos seguir brillando hasta el final de nuestros días.
![poema papa2.docx.png](https://images.hive.blog/DQmULqGofiJsToHXkzTzaRSAJ4DAY4tcJnfsrJU1DWV8Df3/poema%20papa2.docx.png)

68 years is very easy to say, but how many joys and sorrows, how many struggles and falls, how many family losses, but above all how many smiles and beautiful sunrises.

I noticed my father nostalgic, it must be because my mother already left this world and I know that I still miss her. I put myself in their shoes because we all go there and share their feeling, losing your life partner, but the most important thing is to get up and continue, because life must continue to shine until the end of our days.

Así que a vivir que la vida es un ratico nada más....

So let's live life is just a little while...


![Imagen firma2.png](https://images.hive.blog/DQmcJnQmuKxc1J9DeaKnRYDKD5Up2mthrgSYUAuxmS6r6oT/Imagen%20firma2.png)
Las fotografías pertenecen a la autora.
The images are my own
title: Parrilla para celebrar la vida /// Grill to celebrate life.

author: phusionphil
body:
![Rust is a surival role playing game, depending what kind of server you join.](https://images.hive.blog/0x0/https://images.ecency.com/DQmWnmadGG8od8c434BBRgcUY6YMXoi45QzocrBHVUmrEsJ/img_0.605462602550132.jpg)

Today has been plagued with Disconnection issues. So the live stream will be up as soon as I am not constantly trying to join a game. Been on for about 4 Hours but cut the stream today until the lag is fixed. Check my personal blog for an update, or just follow the link at the foot of this article.

We managed to establish a Boat Base in the far north east to refuel during raids on the Large Oil Rig, Oil Rig, and the Cargo Ship. All besides that I have managed to accomplish is making low grade fuel thanks to the lag. I dont want to leave the base and get looted while I am disconnected.

![RUST 8.jpg](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/phusionphil/OFUHhucf-RUST208.jpg)

We will likely be a very militarized group in this Role Play server. All of us are very try hard PvP style players and are doing this to get familiar with each others play styles. Its going to be ineresting to see how the local Hitman, Mercenaries and Merchants react to our oppressive presence. Perhaps we will have some armor to show off today if the server stays up.

Live Stream : https://bittube.tv/post/b98497d1-9117-4835-a534-53611b3b1906
PhusionPhil Live Stream Home Page : https://bittube.tv/profile/PhusionPhil/livestream

author: pereu4ivatel
body:
```Принцип +1919``` прекрасно объединяет в себе кондолбоебизм, рацизм и светлое-бу, на которых можно строить неебанутую цивилизацию.
О чём он, если размахивать лапами.

https://youtu.be/P6hkVXpQYYg

Когда существует единственно верный вариант - это долбоебизм традиционный, необходимый чтоб все обезьянки повторяли то, что получилось у талантливой, то есть удачно мутировавшей, и для прочей усердности, въябывания и наёбывания.
Но если прикинуть фост к носу, сразу начинает двоиться, мерещит(ь)ся придорожный камењ, на котором уже 3 варианта, а загибание паљцев приводит оригинаљничающих к десятку вариантов.
Если тщатељно подумать, вариантов становится 49-50, и как правило на этом этапе можно решить уже любую глобаљную проблему от пандемии до уконтрапупливания гуљфлократий.
Однако самые мощные ребята, посчитав своё, авторитетно заявляют, что жить можно по правилу 960, не нарушая традиций предков, ебавшихся с реаљностью тољко солдатиком.
Потом включается рацист, тыкает всё палкой и пишет, шо ваши законные 960 симпатично перетекают в +1919, хотя нах-нада эти традиции фостатых не ебу. И воще это базовый принцип.
Ну и дружественный кондолбоебизм говорит, шо ваш 1ственно рабочий вариант мы не выкидываем, хоть он заебал даже верных ленивцев, потому и +.
Таким макаром не приученные к мозговым штурмам обезьянки получают векторы для коллективного сознания и возможность эволюционировать в пепелацах на любое кољцо времени. И бананы ![599d17dc3643111cc4094c0531d66994.jpg](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/pereu4ivatel/C0ZznBr0-599d17dc3643111cc4094c0531d66994.jpg)
title: +1919 кар04

author: olaexcel
body:
Appreciation is most importantly and it's the only tool to show support for the people whose aims is to help more has much they can for the society, but most importantly we need to show some appreciation for our life because some are out there who are in need of assistance, charity consist of the assistance a boss render to his or her co-workers in terms of advances payment of salaries may be due to one things or the other, it is a great idea and experience when you first visit charity home and see how people are in need of many things without any assistance provided from people. Everyone has to stand firm and go ahead to help the neediest because a little help from you will definitely go a long way to assist them in all ramifications.

![offering-427297__480.webp](https://images.hive.blog/DQmZ729d9ZVcQ2mWNdrW8bZiQhoG1UNGY83YZTey6UnUkY7/offering-427297__480.webp)



The best way to assist people is to go without expecting anything in return but it may be very difficult for some people who are in need of a pay job but could not find, you can find a job for them without expecting anything in return from them and that is an act of charity and also it is a good and perfect investment because if you don't see the outcome, your children may see the outcome of your investment from them. So always be an helping hands and open your door for charity because it really pays at ends. We all need to let our today speak good of us, so that in tommorow people will have our records among great people of yesterday and our goodwill will make impact not only us but also for our family and friends so let always love people as we love ourselves and give people the way to success and excellent.

However, most times people use to  say charity begin at home and the more you provide assistance to the people around you, the more you should expect from them but the best things is to helps others without expecting anything in return because it's the best way to show more love and appreciation. But remember no helps is a waste times but, it is a great investment for the future and you no what always help people around you and when you find a way to get things done for others definitely they will come back to make life more  easier for you in all works of life.


![soldier-870372__480.jpg](https://images.hive.blog/DQma7UnH6rhUjUgDZT1nnHtE3NNLzpPFRgQYFfSTFunKHBR/soldier-870372__480.jpg)

Before I drop my pen for today, what some people need is to always happy all the time and having people around them not even the material gifts or helps you may render when they are in need but only want to feel among people nothing more and make you as there friends, so that people can see them with you. Charity is not a waste rather it is a kind of future investment because they may be back to tommorow to make life more easier for yourself, family and the people around you who are in need in one way or the other, it's the time to show them appreciation. Thanks you so much everyone for your time and I will see you tomorrow with another interesting topic to discuss with you. Stay blessed.

If you find this message helpful, please upvote, resteemed and comments.

Note: All images used are property of pixabay.

author: strawhat
body:
![image.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/strawhat/hF0VrhAA-image.png)
[Source](https://www.nintendo.pt/Jogos/Nintendo-Switch/BioShock-Infinite-The-Complete-Edition-1790970.html)

Bioshock has been recommended to me many times before but for some reason I never got into it. I haven't played the previous games but read somewhere that you can play this one without having played the other ones and I thought why not let's give it a try.

https://youtu.be/y6pPtYL0pVA

So far the story seems cool as hell and the "intro" to the game was super cool. It seems we have run into a city of weird ass cultists who are also racist apparently. The first "kill" of the game was pretty dope and I was really hoping we would be able to do something to that guy and my prayers were answered in the form of a skyhook. Gonna be really cool to see where the story goes from here. The weapons and these vigor things are really cool and the combat seems pretty awesome so far. I think we gonna have some fun with this one. Til the next one people!

I hope you like the video and please let me know your thoughts in the comments! 


![HGC_Banner.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/strawhat/XIgTbkX8-HGC_Banner.png)
title: [Straw Plays] Bioshock Infinite - Intro

author: riverflows
body:
'Get the flying faaaaaaaaaaaaaaaark off my appppppllleeees', I wail, arms flying and flip flops flapping as I race towards the fruit trees to scare away what can only be called a *gang* of cockatoos. When these big white mofos come down on the trees it's like a zombie hoarde of singleminded destruction, except they're going for plums and quinces, apples and pears - not brains. If you haven't heard what a gang or horde of cockies sound like, they're kinda like a rusty door held up to a microphone and open and shut 300 times - actually fifty rusty doors open and shut in random order. The corellas are even worse en masse - listen, please, so you have an idea of the sound they make: https://youtu.be/k5AW6BiOufo ![image.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/riverflows/OA60VS9Y-image.png) ![image.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/riverflows/ncqMeW2G-image.png) 'You've gotta help me net the trees,' I moan. I'm probably bird like myself, cawing and cackling about what was the flipping point of planting fruit trees in an attempt at fruit self sufficiency if the birds were going to eat them all and I don't *care* if hubby doesn't even *like* fruit, because I do, I water and fertilise and prune the bastards, and what do the birds do? Eat fruit and shit everywhere, that's what they do, look at all the purple shit everywhere from them stealing elderberries and blackcurrants, I mean, it's like someone's got a bird shit paint gun and played paintball in my garden. Hubs backs away slowly, of course, hides in the garage and pretends to be busy sanding the roof of the Defender. ![image.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/riverflows/33IWn4FH-image.png) ![image.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/riverflows/teG13m4O-image.png) He *adores* birds. They make him happy. They make all of us happy - me included, if they're not stealing my goddamn fruit. The maggies that warn us against foxes, the rosellas like flying rainbows, tiny finches and butt shaking willy wagtails with their harem like the stud featherfluffs that they are, the green grassparrots strutting across the garden like they forgot out to fly, the galahs off the telegraph wires, the punk haired doves sitting like stoners on the garden arch, the occasional white goshawk, the kookburras in the distance laughing their asses off (likely at me, banshee'ing across the garden), the pardelotes - tiny and dotted, new England honeyeaters a-swinging from the banksia. ![image.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/riverflows/vsK9OaCs-image.png) ![image.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/riverflows/ciCKvx1R-image.png) But they sure as hell aren't eating *all* my fruit. It's been an El Nina year so we've had unseasonable rain. Consequently, there's more apples and pears than I've ever had. It's not a plum year, except for the Japanese plum, whose fruit hangs in clusters of giant gonads. The pear trees are gigantic - I couldn't net the whole thing if I tried. And I'm worried the bird brained - well - birds will find their way through the netting and get stuck and dehydrated and panicked and caught up in netting and *die*. If you want to see the saddest thing ever, look at my husband's face when he sees a bird die. They say necessity is the mother of invention, so I get inventive and begin a process of wrangling netting. I buy two huge ones from Bunnings and almost get myself wrapped up between two branches of red pears that are dripping from the dizzy heights of the tree. Yep, that's a fail. So I try something else. I cut big ribbons of netting, about a metre wide and a couple of metres long, and wrap them round the branches like giant condoms, pegging as I go. I'm happy to leave the top half for the birds - in fact, they'll get likely two thirds of our crop, because how much fruit can I eat anyway, and how much stewed apple can I fit in my freezer? It takes me a few hours before I'm done. I have pegs in my pockets and hanging from the bottom of my jumper like some punk homesteader apple farmer. My hair's japanese chopsticked with fruit branches and my arms are scratched with an youngberry that managed to stretch itself under the plum. But the trees are netted. ![image.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/riverflows/4WBWaCrH-image.png) I tweet my accomplishment to the hubs, who is still cleverly disguised as a man sanding the roof of a Landrover. 'Look! I did it!' He looks towards the pear closest to him, where I've creatively wrangled a kind of giant sleeve that keeps the fruit encased. It's long and kind of - phallic. He and the kookaburras are laughing. 'It looks like a giant penis,' he says. Well, I did think it looked like a giant netted condom.
# `With Love,` https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmcGSZxvsXD8YbSCNAo6KWc4a9RjXyRCjWupZdPXJapkXk Join The Best Natural Health Community on Hive PeakD - The Best Way to Experience The Hive Blockchain https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/naturalmedicine/g8iI4wLg-MINDFULLIFE.png MINDFUL LIFE is a Natural Medicine project which supports meditators on HIVE [Discord](https://discord.gg/3YJz9fw) II [Community](https://peakd.com/c/hive-120078/created) Creating Abundance for on Hive
title: In Which I Rant About Birds & Work Out A New Netting System for the Fruit Trees
